short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the magic of Sailor Moon with enchanting visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the magic of Sailor Moon to your browser with this enchanting live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A dreamy and celestial interface inspired by Sailor Moon’s iconic style, with soft pastel tones and sparkling details.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Sailor Moon’s magical and graceful energy.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Sailor Moon-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as magical and empowering as Sailor Moon’s abilities.
